TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SufficientStatsBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary:
These objects are stateful, reusable objects that enable the collection of sufficient stats per feature flock, per node or leaf of a tree, to enable it to find the "best" splits.
Each instance of this corresponds to a single flock, but multiple of these will be created per flock. Note that feature indices, whenever present, refer to the feature within the particular flock the same as they do with .

Docs.summary: Subtracts one sufficient statistics from another. Note that this other sufficient statistics object must be over the same feature flock in order to be meaningful, as well as have undergone under the same set of active features.
